title: WGuitarTuner
developerAddress: 69 Arch. Makariou III Ave. Tlais Tower, office 301,
description: Easy and convenient application for tuning you acoustic or electric guitar for Android Wear.! Easy application interface will allow you to tune your guitar to the following guitar tunings.Standard "Standart" Mi, (E) La, (A) Fe, (D) Salt, (G) C, (B) Mi, (E)."Down a half step" - "D #", "G #", "C #", "F #", "A #", "D #"."Dropped D" - D "," A "," D "," G "," B "," E "(Metal Style -)))."Double Dropped D" - "D", "A", "D", "G", "B", "D"."Open A" - "E", "A", "E", "A", "C #", "E"."Open C" - "C", "G", "C", "G", "C", "E"."Open D" - "D", "A", "D", "F #", "A", "D"."Open E" - "E", "B", "E", "G #", "B", "E"."Open Em" - "E", "B", "E", "G", "B", "E"."Open G" - "G", "B", "D", "G", "B", "D".Let's ROCK!
descriptionHTML:
Easy and convenient application for tuning you acoustic or electric guitar for Android Wear.!

Easy application interface will allow you to tune your guitar to the following guitar tunings.

Standard "Standart" Mi, (E) La, (A) Fe, (D) Salt, (G) C, (B) Mi, (E).
"Down a half step" - "D #", "G #", "C #", "F #", "A #", "D #".
"Dropped D" - D "," A "," D "," G "," B "," E "(Metal Style -))).
"Double Dropped D" - "D", "A", "D", "G", "B", "D".
"Open A" - "E", "A", "E", "A", "C #", "E".
"Open C" - "C", "G", "C", "G", "C", "E".
"Open D" - "D", "A", "D", "F #", "A", "D".
"Open E" - "E", "B", "E", "G #", "B", "E".
"Open Em" - "E", "B", "E", "G", "B", "E".
"Open G" - "G", "B", "D", "G", "B", "D".

Let's ROCK!
comments: Perfect I rarely give 5 star ratings, but this app on my watch is nice.  The look, design and especially the % marker is fabulous.
